chat.settings.field.paste_long_text_to_f: Dolžina za pretvorbo dolgega besedila v datoteko
chat.settings.field.copy_text_attachment: Kopiraj besedilne priloge kot navadno besedilo
chat.settings.field.ask_for_title_confir: Pred spremembo naslova pogovora vprašaj za potrditev
chat.settings.field.always_show_sidebar_: Na namizju vedno pokaži stransko vrstico
chat.settings.field.auto_show_sidebar_on: Ob novem klepetu samodejno pokaži stransko vrstico
chat.settings.help.api_key: Set the API Key if you are using --api-key option for the server.
chat.settings.help.system_message: The starting message that defines how model should behave.
chat.settings.help.show_system_message: Display the system message at the top of each conversation.
chat.settings.help.theme: Choose the color theme for the interface. You can choose between System (follows your device settings), Light, or Dark.
chat.settings.help.paste_long_text_to_fi: On pasting long text, it will be converted to a file. You can control the file length by setting the value of this parameter. Value 0 means disable.
chat.settings.help.copy_text_attachments: When copying a message with text attachments, combine them into a single plain text string instead of a special format that can be pasted back as attachments.
chat.settings.help.samplers: The order at which samplers are applied, in simplified way. Default is "top_k;typ_p;top_p;min_p;temperature": top_k->typ_p->top_p->min_p->temperature
chat.settings.help.backend_sampling: Enable backend-based samplers. When enabled, supported samplers run on the accelerator backend for faster sampling.
chat.settings.help.temperature: Controls the randomness of the generated text by affecting the probability distribution of the output tokens. Higher = more random, lower = more focused.
chat.settings.help.dynamic_temperature_r: Addon for the temperature sampler. The added value to the range of dynamic temperature, which adjusts probabilities by entropy of tokens.
chat.settings.help.dynamic_temperature_e: Addon for the temperature sampler. Smoothes out the probability redistribution based on the most probable token.
chat.settings.help.top_p: Limits tokens to those that together have a cumulative probability of at least p
chat.settings.help.min_p: Limits tokens based on the minimum probability for a token to be considered, relative to the probability of the most likely token.
chat.settings.help.xtc_probability: XTC sampler cuts out top tokens; this parameter controls the chance of cutting tokens at all. 0 disables XTC.
chat.settings.help.xtc_threshold: XTC sampler cuts out top tokens; this parameter controls the token probability that is required to cut that token.
chat.settings.help.typical_p: Sorts and limits tokens based on the difference between log-probability and entropy.
chat.settings.help.repeat_last_n: Last n tokens to consider for penalizing repetition
chat.settings.help.repeat_penalty: Controls the repetition of token sequences in the generated text
chat.settings.help.presence_penalty: Limits tokens based on whether they appear in the output or not.
chat.settings.help.frequency_penalty: Limits tokens based on how often they appear in the output.
chat.settings.help.dry_multiplier: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the DRY sampling multiplier.
chat.settings.help.dry_base: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the DRY sampling base value.
chat.settings.help.dry_allowed_length: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the allowed length for DRY sampling.
chat.settings.help.dry_penalty_last_n: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets DRY penalty for the last n tokens.
chat.settings.help.max_tokens: The maximum number of token per output. Use -1 for infinite (no limit).
chat.settings.help.custom_json: Custom JSON parameters to send to the API. Must be valid JSON format.
chat.settings.help.show_thought_in_progr: Expand thought process by default when generating messages.
chat.settings.help.show_tool_calls: Display tool call labels and payloads from Harmony-compatible delta.tool_calls data below assistant messages.
chat.settings.help.show_raw_llm_output: Show raw LLM output without backend parsing and frontend Markdown rendering to inspect streaming across different models.
chat.settings.help.keep_stats_visible: Keep processing statistics visible after generation finishes.
chat.settings.help.show_message_stats: Display generation statistics (tokens/second, token count, duration) below each assistant message.
chat.settings.help.ask_for_title_confirm: Ask for confirmation before automatically changing conversation title when editing the first message.
chat.settings.help.parse_pdf_as_image: Parse PDF as image instead of text. Automatically falls back to text processing for non-vision models.
chat.settings.help.disable_auto_scroll: Disable automatic scrolling while messages stream so you can control the viewport position manually.
chat.settings.help.render_user_content_a: Render user messages using markdown formatting in the chat.
chat.settings.help.always_show_sidebar_o: Always keep the sidebar visible on desktop instead of auto-hiding it.
chat.settings.help.auto_show_sidebar_on_: Automatically show sidebar when starting a new chat. Disable to keep the sidebar hidden until you click on it.
chat.settings.help.show_microphone_on_em: Automatically show microphone button instead of send button when textarea is empty for models with audio modality support.
chat.settings.help.py_interpreter_enable: Enable Python interpreter using Pyodide. Allows running Python code in markdown code blocks.
chat.settings.help.enable_continue_gener: Enable "Continue" button for assistant messages. Currently works only with non-reasoning models.
chat.settings.saved_notice: Nastavitve so shranjene v localStorage brskalnika
chat.settings.error.invalid_custom_json: Neveljaven JSON v parametrih po meri. Preverite obliko in poskusite znova.
chat.settings.error.invalid_numeric: Neveljavna številčna vrednost za {field}. Vnesite veljavno številko.
chat.settings.footer.reset_dialog.title: Ponastavi nastavitve na privzeto
chat.settings.footer.reset_dialog.descri: Ali ste prepričani, da želite ponastaviti vse nastavitve na njihove privzete vrednosti? To bo ponastavilo vse parametre na vrednosti, ki jih vrne strežnikova končna točka /props, in odstranilo vse vaše nastavitve po meri.
chat.settings.import_export.export.title: Izvozi pogovore
chat.settings.import_export.export.descr: Prenesite vse pogovore kot datoteko JSON. To vključuje vsa sporočila, priloge in zgodovino pogovorov.
chat.settings.import_export.import.title: Uvozi pogovore
chat.settings.import_export.import.descr: Uvozite enega ali več pogovorov iz prej izvožene datoteke JSON. Pogovori bodo združeni z vašimi obstoječimi pogovori.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.title: Izbriši vse pogovore
chat.settings.import_export.delete.descr: Trajno izbrišite vse pogovore in njihova sporočila. Tega dejanja ni mogoče razveljaviti. Če želite ohraniti varnostno kopijo, najprej razmislite o izvozu pogovorov.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.dialo: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati vse pogovore? Tega dejanja ni mogoče razveljaviti in trajno bo odstranilo vse pogovore in sporočila.
chat.settings.import_export.import.inval: Neveljavna oblika datoteke: pričakovano polje pogovorov ali en sam objekt pogovora
chat.settings.import_export.import.faile: Uvoz pogovorov ni uspel. Preverite obliko datoteke.
